item.title: 英特尔从美国获得多达 30 亿美元用于国家安全相关芯片生产
item.description: 拜登政府周一从《CHIPS 和科学法案》（CHIPS and Science Act）中拨款 30 亿美元给英特尔公司，用于开发微电子 "安全飞地"，微电子是各种武器系统和其他国家安全产品的关键部件。【原文：The Biden Administration on Monday awarded Intel Corp. up to $3 billion from the CHIPS and Science Act to develop a "Secure Enclave" for microelectronics, which are a critical component to a wide range of weapon systems and other national security products.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Vista、Blackstone 接近达成 80 亿美元收购 Smartsheet 的交易
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士周一表示，收购公司 Vista Equity Partners 和 Blackstone 正在就收购 Smartsheet 进行深入谈判，这笔交易可能会使这家协作软件制造商的估值接近 80 亿美元。【原文：Buyout firms Vista Equity Partners and Blackstone are in advanced talks to acquire Smartsheet , in a deal that could value the collaboration-software maker at close to $8 billion, people familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 阿根廷第二季度经济预计将继续衰退
item.description: 路透社周一的一项民意调查显示，阿根廷第二季度经济可能比去年同期萎缩1.4%，这是阿根廷经济第五次出现这种萎缩，因为在自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊的严厉紧缩政策下，经济衰退正在加深。【原文：Argentina's economy likely shrank 1.4% in the second quarter versus a year earlier, a Reuters poll showed on Monday, the fifth such decline as a recession deepens under a tough austerity drive by libertarian President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 贝莱德：美联储降息幅度不会如市场预期那么大
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）在周一的一份报告中说，由于经济有韧性，通胀保持稳定，美联储很可能不会像债券市场预期的那样大幅下调美国利率。【原文：The Federal Reserve will likely not cut U.S. interest rates as deeply as the bond market expects due to a resilient economy and inflation remaining sticky, the BlackRock Investment Institute said in a note on Monday.】

item.title: 亚马逊规定明年起每周办公五天
item.description: 亚马逊公司周一表示，将要求员工从 2025 年 1 月 2 日起每周返回办公室工作五天。【原文：Amazon.com said on Monday it would require employees to return to the office five days per week, effective Jan. 2, 2025.】

item.title: 斯堪尼亚首席执行官表示，尽管存在裁员和交付问题，但仍将致力于 Northvolt 的发展
item.description: 斯堪尼亚首席执行官周一表示，尽管最近出现了生产和交付问题，但斯堪尼亚的所有者Traton公司仍将继续使用瑞典Northvolt公司作为该卡车制造商的唯一电池供应商。【原文：Scania owner Traton is committed to using Sweden's Northvolt as the truckmaker's single battery supplier despite recent production and delivery problems, its CEO said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国俄勒冈州推翻对 J&J 公司 2.6 亿美元滑石粉案的判决，下令重审
item.description: 强生公司周一表示，俄勒冈州的一名法官推翻了对强生公司的 2.6 亿美元的判决，该判决是由一名妇女提起的诉讼中作出的。【原文：An Oregon judge has overturned a $260 million verdict against Johnson & Johnson in a lawsuit brought by a woman who said she got mesothelioma, a deadly cancer linked to asbestos exposure, from inhaling the company's talc powder, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: IDC 称，VR 和 AR 头显需求将因人工智能和成本降低而激增
item.description: 研究公司IDC周一表示，受价格更低廉的设备和人工智能功能的推动，2025年全球增强现实和虚拟现实（AR/VR）头盔的出货量预计将增长41.4%。【原文：Global shipments for augmented and virtual reality (AR/VR) headsets are expected to grow 41.4% in 2025, powered by more affordable devices and addition of artificial intelligence features, research firm IDC said on Monday.】

item.title: 人工智能专家准备了 "人类最后的考试"，以挑战强大的技术
item.description: 一个技术专家小组周一发出全球呼吁，希望向人工智能系统提出最棘手的问题。【原文：A team of technology experts issued a global call on Monday seeking the toughest questions to pose to artificial intelligence systems, which increasingly have handled popular benchmark tests like child's play.】

item.title: 意大利反垄断审查瑞士电信与沃达丰交易对固定电话服务的影响
item.description: 意大利竞争监督机构周一表示，瑞士电信和沃达丰意大利分公司计划进行的合作可能会对该国固网连接服务的竞争构成威胁。【原文：Italy's competition watchdog said on Monday a planned tie-up between Swisscom's and Vodafone's Italian units could pose a threat to competition in the country's fixed-line connectivity services.】

item.title: 大石油公司在有关产量和价格的美国消费者诉讼中败诉
item.description: 埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）和雪佛龙（Chevron）等几家石油公司周一驳回了消费者的上诉，消费者指控这些公司与前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府、俄罗斯和沙特阿拉伯勾结，削减石油产量，抬高了油泵价格。【原文：Several oil companies including Exxon Mobil and Chevron on Monday defeated an appeal by consumers who accused them of colluding with former President Donald Trump's administration, Russia and Saudi Arabia to cut oil production, boosting prices at the pump.】

item.title: 白宫布雷纳德称美国通胀处于转折点，重点应转向就业
item.description: 白宫高级经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）周一宣布，美国经济在降低通胀方面已经出现转机，现在应该集中精力维护劳动力市场最近取得的进展。【原文：Top White House economic adviser Lael Brainard on Monday declared that the U.S. economy had turned the corner in bringing down inflation and it was now time to focus on safeguarding recent progress in the labor market.】

item.title: Guardian Pharmacy 在美国 IPO 的目标估值高达 9.74 亿美元
item.description: Guardian Pharmacy Services 周一表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达 9.735 亿美元。【原文：Guardian Pharmacy Services said on Monday it was targeting a valuation as much as $973.5 million in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的音乐厂牌环球唱片（Universal）在股价暴跌后成为投资者关注的焦点
item.description: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的音乐厂牌环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周二举行了首次资本市场日活动，在此之前近两个月，该公司公布的第二季度流媒体和订阅收入低于预期，股价下跌了 24%。【原文：Taylor Swift's music label Universal Music Group holds its first capital markets day on Tuesday, nearly two months after it posted lower-than-expected second quarter streaming and subscription revenue, knocking 24% off its share price.】

item.title: 顶级商业银行加入七国集团主导的央行数字货币试验
item.description: 40 家世界领先的商业银行加入了由七国集团牵头、纽约联储以及欧洲、韩国和日本主要央行参与的一项试点计划，该计划旨在建立一个新的数字货币平台，以加快和加强跨境支付。【原文：Forty of the world's leading commercial banks have joined a G7-led pilot scheme with the New York Fed and leading central banks from Europe, Korea and Japan for a new digital currency platform designed to speed up and enhance cross border payments.】

item.title: 亚马逊司机加入纽约卡车司机工会
item.description: 电子商务巨头亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的数百名送货司机已加入国际卡车司机兄弟会（International Brotherhood of Teamsters），寻求改善工资、工作条件和安全标准。【原文：Hundreds of delivery drivers for e-commerce giant Amazon.com have joined the International Brotherhood of Teamsters, seeking improved wages, working conditions and safety standards, the labor union said on Monday.】

item.title: iPhone 16 发货时间缩短预示需求疲软，苹果股价下滑
item.description: 周一，苹果公司股价下跌近 3%，因为几位分析师称，新款 iPhone 16 Pro 机型的交货时间表明需求弱于预期，这可能是由于关键人工智能功能推迟推出所致。【原文：Shares of Apple fell nearly 3% on Monday after several analysts said that delivery times for the new iPhone 16 Pro models indicated weaker-than-expected demand, possibly due to the delayed rollout of key artificial intelligence features.】

item.title: 前拜登经济顾问派尔将重返贝莱德集团
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份内部备忘录，曾担任美国总统乔-拜登经济顾问的迈克-派尔（Mike Pyle）将重返贝莱德，担任投资组合管理集团（PMG）副主管。【原文：Mike Pyle, who had served as an economic adviser to U.S. President Joe Biden, will return to BlackRock as deputy head of its Portfolio Management Group (PMG), according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 罢工开始后，波音公司冻结招聘，采取措施节省现金
item.description: 在上周五约 33,000 名工人举行罢工后，波音公司正在暂停招聘，并采取全面措施节约现金，包括考虑让许多员工暂时休假。【原文：Boeing is pausing hiring and taking sweeping steps to conserve cash after about 33,000 workers went on strike on Friday including considering temporary furloughs for many employees.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰发现越来越多的印度买家选择电动汽车作为第一辆豪华车
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）印度总经理告诉路透社，选择电动汽车作为其第一辆豪华车的印度买家数量正在增加，这一趋势正在帮助这家德国汽车制造商提高其销量。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is seeing a rise in the number of Indian buyers opting for electric vehicles as their first luxury car, the country's managing director told Reuters, a trend that is helping the German carmaker boost their sales.】

item.title: 美国利率期货认为美联储采取超大规模行动的概率较高
item.description: LSEG 的计算显示，衡量银行间无担保隔夜贷款成本的美联储基金利率期货定价中，美联储周三降息 50 个基点的可能性接近 60%。【原文：Futures on the fed funds rate, which measures the cost of unsecured overnight loans between banks, have priced in a nearly 60% chance of a 50 basis-point rate cut by the Federal Reserve on Wednesday, LSEG calculations showed.】

item.title: 阿根廷市场为米莱伊 "雄心勃勃 "的零赤字预算欢呼雀跃
item.description: 阿根廷主权债券和股票指数在周一早盘交易中攀升，原因是投资者对自由派总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）雄心勃勃的 2025 年预算计划表示欢迎，该计划预计将实现强劲增长，并坚持 "零 "财政赤字。【原文：Argentina's sovereign bonds and stock index climbed in early trading on Monday, as investors cheered an ambitious 2025 budget plan from libertarian President Javier Milei, that predicts robust growth and sticks to a "zero" fiscal deficit.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称泰国政府提名前财政部长担任央行董事会主席
item.description: 据两位消息人士透露，泰国政府将提名一位忠于执政党并批评央行行长的人士担任泰国央行行长，以在利率问题长期存在分歧的情况下对该机构施加影响。【原文：The Thai government will nominate a ruling party loyalist and critic of the central bank governor for chair of the Bank of Thailand, seeking to assert influence on the institution amid a protracted rift over interest rates, according to two sources.】

item.title: 调查发现，瑞银的行业客户越来越挑剔
item.description: 一项调查发现，近四分之一的瑞士工业企业对瑞银集团自 2023 年收购瑞士信贷以来的服务感到不满，尤其是在贷款方面。【原文：Nearly a quarter of Swiss industrial companies are unhappy with the service from UBS , notably in lending, since its 2023 Credit Suisse takeover, a survey found, in a blow to the bank's efforts to show it is not abusing its market dominance.】

item.title: 世贸组织总干事奥孔乔-伊韦拉计划寻求连任
item.description: 世界贸易组织总干事恩古齐-奥孔乔-伊韦拉（Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala）周一告诉路透社记者，在非洲主导的广泛推动下，她将寻求连任四年的世界贸易组织负责人，并表示她希望完成其第一个任期内的 "未竟事业"。【原文：WTO Director-General Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala told Reuters on Monday that she will seek another four-year term as head of the World Trade Organization following a broad Africa-led push to start the process early, saying she hopes to complete "unfinished business" from her first mandate.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，花旗任命技术主管瑞安与塞尔瓦一起解决数据管理问题
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份备忘录，花旗集团已责成技术主管蒂姆-瑞安（Tim Ryan）与首席运营官阿南德-塞尔瓦（Anand Selva）合作，解决该银行长期存在的数据管理问题。【原文：Citigroup has tasked technology head Tim Ryan to work alongside Chief Operating Officer Anand Selva in fixing the bank's longstanding data management issues, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 加拿大 8 月成屋销售升至 7 个月新高
item.description: 加拿大房地产协会周一公布的数据显示，8月份加拿大成屋销售环比增长1.3%，销售量达到1月份以来的最高水平，但同比下降2.1%。【原文：Canadian home sales rose 1.3% in August from the previous month, with sales reaching their highest level since January but falling 2.1% on an annual basis, data from the Canadian Real Estate Association showed on Monday.】

item.title: 卡尔-伊坎欢迎驳回伊坎企业诉讼，但不出售股票
item.description: 卡尔-伊坎（Carl Icahn）周一表示，他很高兴联邦法官驳回了指控这位亿万富翁欺诈其投资公司伊坎企业（Icahn Enterprises）股东从而获得大量个人贷款的诉讼。【原文：Carl Icahn said on Monday he was pleased a federal judge dismissed a lawsuit accusing the billionaire of defrauding shareholders of his investment company Icahn Enterprises so he could obtain large amounts of personal loans.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司希望 2030 年电动汽车销量占欧洲销量的一半
item.description: 全球最大的商用车制造商之一戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）的梅赛德斯-奔驰卡车部门负责人卡琳-拉德斯特罗姆（Karin Radstrom）周一表示，该公司的目标是到 2030 年，其欧洲销量的一半将来自电动卡车。【原文：Daimler Truck , one of the world's biggest commercial vehicle makers, aims for half of its European sales to come from electric trucks in 2030, the head of its Mercedes-Benz Trucks unit, Karin Radstrom, said on Monday.】

item.title: 比利时工人就布鲁塞尔奥迪车队受到威胁举行游行以示同情
item.description: 周一，5000 多人在布鲁塞尔游行，比利时首都大部分公共交通暂停，声援工作受到威胁的布鲁塞尔奥迪公司工人。【原文：More than 5,000 people marched through Brussels and most public transport in the Belgian capital was suspended on Monday in solidarity with workers of Audi Brussels whose jobs are threatened.】
